alert.note: Alert for Northern Washoe County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 17 at 1:25PM PST until January 18 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Icy roads and visibility less than one mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...Valley locations in Plumas, Sierra, Lassen, and northern Washoe Counites. This includes Susanville, Doyle, Honey Lake and Highway 395 north of Hallelujah Junction * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential for ice on roads.
info.instruction: A light coating of ice and low visibility may lead to treacherous driving conditions. Slow down and avoid braking and making sudden turns. Be careful walking outside as slipping and falling greatly increases the risk of injuries.
